question: Which Indian state launched its first paperless budget of Rs 5.50 lakh crore?
explanation:
The state Government of Uttar Pradesh presented the first paperless budget of Rs 5.50 lakh crore in the state.
The budget for the Financial Year 2021-22 was presented by the state's Finance Minister Suresh Khanna. All members of the UP Legislative Assembly were given tablets to read the budget and a mobile app called "Uttar Pradesh Sarkar ka Budget" was also launched.
